DOMMatrixSkewXSelf.summary: The skewXSelf() method of the interface is a mutable transformation method that modifies a matrix. It skews the source matrix by applying the specified skew transformation along the X-axis and returns the skewed matrix.

remarks.para: To skew a matrix along the X-axis without mutating it, see

-
-CSS transform property
-CSS transform-function functions-transform-function/skew
-transform-function/skewX
-transform-function/skewY
-transform-function/skewZ
-CSS transforms module
-SVG transform attribute
- interface methods-
-
-

DOMMatrixSkewXSelf.returns:
Returns itself; the DOMMatrix skewed along the X-axis by the given
angle.
